== Version changes:
2015-06-01 - Now Live
Added a new tier 4 boss. This boss type is currently in testing, so donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t expect to see them around much.
All bosses can now repair sails. Tier 3+ bosses can repair hull while docked and will automatically try to escape combat and get to a friendly town when low on health.
Added /reloadServerData to make the server reload its configuration data. Useful if youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve made local changes. This will also reload the admin and ban lists.
Tier 3 (dread lords) and higher bosses now see through fog.
Single player faction naming conventions will no longer affect multiplayer when going from SP to MP. It was always just a visual client-side change, so harmless regardless.
